comments.content: We're really sorry but we can't actually triage th
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sylvain-bauza

comments.content:
We're really sorry but we can't actually triage that bug since it misses important details.

Could you please at least tell us :
 - which Nova release is impacted by that exception ?
 - what the nova-api.log stacktrace looks like?

Thanks.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sylvain-bauza
